response.original_title: Broadway's Leading Ladies: Shirley Jones & Florence Henderson
response.overview: Before their stars shined brightly on "The Partridge Family" and "The Brady Bunch," Shirley Jones and Florence Henderson's names appeared in lights up and down Broadway. They were hits in the hits such as Oklahoma, Carousel, the Music Man, Camelot, the Sound of Music, Annie Get Your Gun, the King And I, My Fair Lady, South Pacific and others. This DVD shows each woman in her prime singing many of the songs from those shows while performing on the Bell Telephone Hour between 1960 and 1966.
response.title: Broadway's Leading Ladies: Shirley Jones & Florence Henderson
